title.rendered: INTECH surpasses client’s expectations in all key project metrics after successfully providing Injection Skids at a major oil field in Middle East

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH receives outstanding feedback from the client as it wraps up a project for providing injection skids at a major oil field in Middle East.

Through this project, INTECH has been able to help the client bring several production systems online. INTECH’s scope included all phases from design & manufacturing to final testing and supply of the requested skids. The overall package comprised of more than 10 chemical injection and anti-foam injection skids featuring a high degree of automation and digitalization for enabling remote monitoring & diagnosis of the skids’ operations, if required.

The client expressed utmost satisfaction with the overall execution of the project. They highly commended the quality of INTECH’s products & services along with engineering & documentation. The client specifically praised INTECH project team’s progress reporting and responses to customer queries. INTECH’s services were highly recommended for future undertakings.

“This is my second FAT with INTECH. I appreciate INTECH work quality, your seriousness, and your professionalism. Thank you and good continuation

The award of this project formed a part of INTECH’s highly successful recent run of project-wins in Middle East, which is a testament to the trust that it enjoys from oil and gas companies operating in the region. It’s more-than-a-decade long history of successful project completions in the Middle East, proven capability of innovation & handling complex projects in the region, as well as familiarity and experience at the said oil field made INTECH the ideal service provider for this project.

About INTECH Wellhead Solutions

INTECH’s Wellhead Automation Solutions cover design, manufacturing, installation, commissioning, and operation & maintenance of Wellhead Systems in any location worldwide. Our wellhead products cover generic and custom-built vendor-neutral solutions which range from hydraulic control panels and subsea master control stations to artificial lift optimization solutions, pump-off controllers, wellhead RTUs and injection skids. INTECH’s dedicated panel shops in USA and UAE help deliver UL certified panels in record times without compromising standards and quality.

For more information about INTECH Wellhead Solutions, click here: https://www.intechww.com/skids-packages/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.

For more Information, visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
